verbose_text: Gene context analysis indicates that most of the catabolic transcarbamylase genes are located in the vicinity of the carbamate kinase gene [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] and further confirmed the characteristic co-transcription of these two genes, which might be used to distinguish the catabolic transcarbamylase from anabolic transcarbamylase [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: catabolic transcarbamylase genes are located in the vicinity of the carbamate kinase gene [ XREF_BIBR , XREF_BIBR , XREF_BIBR , XREF_BIBR , XREF_BIBR , XREF_BIBR , XREF_BIBR , XREF_BIBR ] and further confirmed the characteristic co-transcription
